ComicInfo.Title: Pivotal Scenes from My Life as a Stage Actress; Her Day
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 08:40:36. [CVDB142018] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 22:15:10. [Issue ID 304901]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Pivotal Scenes from My Life as a Stage Actress: Author tells story of how throughout school over multiple years she frequently shared the stage in plays with Matthew Moore. In their senior year of school, two months before graduation, Matthew and another boy, Seth, were killed in a car accident. The author never acted in a play again.
Her Day: The Go-Go Gang and the giant robot Metallia attack the Hepburns store at a shopping mall, and Ultra Girl and Action Girl fight and defeat them.
